<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">粗略的扫了一下前面的答案</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">有几个典型的答案我觉得有必要反驳一下</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
1</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">）</span><span style="font-size:
14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">拜大牛为师</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold"> -- </span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold">你想得美</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">看起来很美好</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">实际上想拜大牛为师的多了去了</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">大牛凭什么看中你呀</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">；</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">而且一个公司或者部门的大牛本来就不多</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">你正好和大牛在一个组的几率是很小的</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">；</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果都不在同一个组</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:
"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:
0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";mso-font-kerning:0pt">你根本都没有机会接触大牛</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Microsoft Tai Le";mso-font-kerning:0pt">，</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Kaiti SC Black";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">更别说深入请教和学习了</span><span style="font-size:14.0pt;
font-family:"Hannotate SC Bold";mso-bidi-font-family:"Microsoft Tai Le";
mso-font-kerning:0pt">；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:14.0pt;
